name: Space Rangers - From Orbit
description:
From Orbit is a platformer set on a fictional planet.

The game is based upon the idea of a spaceship being crashed on an unknown planet. Players find themselves having to dodge through pieces of the floor that are able to kill the player as well as robots that roam around the planet's surface and will get rid of anyone who touches them. The players will also have to navigate through gaps, where if they fall through, they will have to restart the level.
